channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4928] Search (Techview) - Scrambled results
item.description:
Issue
Searchresults are scrambled if Techview is chosen. The problem is caused by long Manufacturer-names.

Actions
Investigate & fix the issue.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: @Jan: Kannst du dir das mal kurz anschauen? Der Herstellername ist zu lang und das zerreisst dann die Ansicht. Vielleicht können wir ihn kürzen oder die Ansicht anders darstellen.
I added the same length restriction as for the Type field. Can be tested after next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4897] Outlet Shop: Create impex statements for all langauges and catalog versions
item.description:
After outlet store was tested successfully for CH:

For the outlet store: create impex statements similar to the attached impex_storePageTemplate:CH.impex for all languages and catalog versions (see attachment of parent ticket).
Currently it's only defined for CH and German.

Add this also to the projectdata in /distrelecB2Bcore/resources/distrelecB2Bcore/import/project/contentCatalogs
item.summary: Outlet Shop: Create impex statements for all langauges and catalog versions

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4868] Style Title
item.description:
Can you please style the title in /distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/WEB-INF/views/desktop/pages/terrific/search/storePage.jsp according to https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/905+-+Outlet+Shop.

**************************************
If the Page Title, which is currently "Outlet Store | Distrelec Schweiz" does not work, a new variable has to be added to the model.

If this new attribute could be useful for all pages, it should be added in AbstractPageController.storeContentPageTitleInModel(..), otherwise in OutletStorePageController.outletStoreDetails(..)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Jan,
Could you please reduce the white space below the title? (screenshot)

Hi Florian,

I adjusted the title margin to be 40px, which is our second standard margin. See attached screenshot. If thats ok, you can resolve the ticket, otherwise please assign it back to me.

Jan

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4757] Add Redirection for Landingpage
item.description:
Please define a redirect "http://www.distrelec.ch/flukeconnect" on the URL http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Home/cms/fluke_micro_home_wm_ch_1411

Also for the French version: http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Accueil/cms/fluke_micro_home_wm_ch_1411

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4371] Zero result page adjustment
item.description:
As discussed in the end of February, we need to get a different zero result page. Still, no changes happened.

The structure should be as follows:

• Title as today (No results found…)
• A subtitle/descriptive line with tips for searching
• The search box once again, with different CTA text in it (if possible)
• A subtitle as introduction for the feedback form
• The feedback form, sending requests to the customer service of the respective country

There is a rough draft attached to get an idea how we would like to have it.

(DISTSEARCH-68 http://198.18.7.87/browse/DISTSEARCH-68?filter=-2)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Attached the translations for the modification of the page.

Hi Daniela,

There are one question and one assumption on this task, which I want to ask you :-
1. The search box on the gui in the canter air is just a text input box not like the full functional search box like we have on the top left side which has suggestion feature and all.
2. Suggestion or recommendation box on the bottom
a. What will be the criteria for making suggestion ?
Because the name of the product or search team for which the such was done was wrong that's why he landed on this page.
3. Text just bellow the red light colour Starting with Tipp: will it be change time and again for example via cms

Hi Neeraj

1. What do you mean with "just text input"? That the suggest is not popping up? If yes, it would be great if at least the query suggest could be activated in this box.
2. The suggestions will be campaigns out of FACT-Finder with some hand-picked products or some business rules (e.g. selection of new products, etc). So they do not have to be connected to the search term, but they should be maintained via campaigns or CMS.
3. The Tipp is currently not meant to change.

Does this answer your questions?

Hi Daniela,

Yes. We have started the development now.

Hi Florian,

The development has been done on this task. But we need support from some frontend engginer so that he can arrange the zero result page with the mock attached with the task.

Can you assign it to some front end engginer and let him to adjust the page looks like mock or I can explain it to him.

Thanks
The name of the page is called searchEmptyPage.jsp which needs to be adjusted.

Front end work done.
Thanks
Ruben

Hi Ruben,
Could you please align it more to the mockup in terms of font-color and spacing. Thanks.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4343] Addition of an Outlet Shop
item.description:
We need to have an outlet shop (similiar to the one in the ELFA shop).

--> Specification: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/905+-+Outlet+Shop

Next Steps
Specification
Estimate
Planning
Implementation

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Cloned from DISTRELEC-4288 due to accidentially logged work.

<Product ID="di01601812" UserTypeID="DI01_Article" ParentID="15519" AnalyzerResult="included">
  <Name>17030661</Name>
  <ProductCrossReference ProductID="man_nxp" Type="Manufacturer" AnalyzerResult="included"/>
  <AssetCrossReference AssetID="sot143.tif" Type="Primary Image" AnalyzerResult="included"/>
  <AssetCrossReference AssetID="vj601812_e" Type="Datasheet" AnalyzerResult="included"/>
  <Values>
	...
	...
	<MultiValue AttributeID="nomoverslabel_txt">
	  <Value>CH_20140701-20140731</Value>
	  <Value>AT_20140701-20140731</Value>
	  <Value>IT_20140701-20140731</Value>
	</MultiValue>
	...
	...

There is already an attribute nomoverslabel_txt managed in PIM that is foreseen to be used for exactly getting rid of "no movers" (aka "Ladenhüter" . The attribute tells the date range per country.

Hi Adi,
The outlet items are not the same as no movers.
They want to use them for other activities.

Estimation:

  • PIM-Import (exact Definition required: see DISTRELEC-4677)
    --> 1d
  • Factfinder Export (Definition required: if a own field in Factfinder or similar to the Top-/Hit- or New-Flag)
    --> 1d
  • Backend / Contoller and Search-Logic
    --> 1d
  • WCMS
    --> 1.5d
  • Frontend / Display Sales-Label
    --> 0.5d
  • DM / HMC / Doku
    --> 0.5d

==> Total ca. 5.5d
@Florian: Please review the estimation and assign to the desired sprint...

New requirements updated at:
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/905+-+Outlet+Shop

Soap-Call for outlet-search:

<ns2:filters>
	<ns2:Filter>						
		<ns2:name>PromotionLabels</ns2:name>
		<ns2:substring>true</ns2:substring>
		<ns2:valueList>
			<ns2:FilterValue>
				<ns2:type>and</ns2:type>
				<ns2:value>rank:8,active:true</ns2:value>
			</ns2:FilterValue>
		</ns2:valueList>
	</ns2:Filter>
</ns2:filters>
<ns2:page>1</ns2:page>
<ns2:query>*</ns2:query>

TODO:

  • review
  • create impex for WCMS part for all content catalogs
  • OpenGraph-Information (OutletStorePageController) --> like for the search result page this will not be computed
  • Test with NoMover-Products on DEV (should be imported over the weekend)
  • Test move previous / move next
  • Test ProductFinder (due to refactoring search mechanism)
  • display label (frontend)
  • change page label to "outlet" (for http://distrelec-ch.local:9001/de/Outlet%20Store/cms/outletStorePage does not trigger the controller method)

The search for the redirect on the product detail page didn't work.
The ProductPageController needs to know, that a Outlet-Search was performed before. Therefore a flag will be added to the ProductDetailLink.

It is a flag and not the searchType, because an own outletSearchResultProductConverter is required to distinguish between the two states while converting the productUrl. If something similar is required at other places, this can easily be changed by creating more specific SearchResultProductConverterSearchResultProductConverters.

Open Issues:

  • create impex statements similar to the attached impex_storePageTemplate:CH.impex for all languages and catalogversions
    • currently it's only defined for CH and German
    • add this also to the projectdata in /distrelecB2Bcore/resources/distrelecB2Bcore/import/project/contentCatalogs
  • style page title (subticket for jan)
  • problem with redirect loop on the product detail page (subticket for raphael)
  • testing
Created sub-ticket for impex statement generation DISTRELEC-4897

page title seems to be fixed
redirect loop is fixed
